paragraphs.content: We then, as workers together with him, beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain.
paragraphs.contentHtml: We then, as workers together with him, beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain.

paragraphs.content: (For he saith, I have heard thee in a time accepted, and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee: behold, now is the accepted time; behold, now is the day of salvation.)
paragraphs.contentHtml: (For he saith, I have heard thee in a time accepted, and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee: behold, now is the accepted time; behold, now is the day of salvation.)

paragraphs.content: Giving no offence in any thing, that the ministry be not blamed:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Giving no offence in any thing, that the ministry be not blamed:

paragraphs.content: But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God, in much patience, in afflictions, in necessities, in distresses,
paragraphs.contentHtml: But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God, in much patience, in afflictions, in necessities, in distresses,

paragraphs.content: In stripes, in imprisonments, in tumults, in labours, in watchings, in fastings;
paragraphs.contentHtml: In stripes, in imprisonments, in tumults, in labours, in watchings, in fastings;

paragraphs.content: By pureness, by knowledge, by longsuffering, by kindness, by the Holy Ghost, by love unfeigned,
paragraphs.contentHtml: By pureness, by knowledge, by longsuffering, by kindness, by the Holy Ghost, by love unfeigned,

paragraphs.content: By the word of truth, by the power of God, by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left,
paragraphs.contentHtml: By the word of truth, by the power of God, by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left,

paragraphs.content: By honour and dishonour, by evil report and good report: as deceivers, and yet true;
paragraphs.contentHtml: By honour and dishonour, by evil report and good report: as deceivers, and yet true;

paragraphs.content: As unknown, and yet well known; as dying, and, behold, we live; as chastened, and not killed;
paragraphs.contentHtml: As unknown, and yet well known; as dying, and, behold, we live; as chastened, and not killed;

paragraphs.content: As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.
paragraphs.contentHtml: As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.

paragraphs.content: O ye Corinthians, our mouth is open unto you, our heart is enlarged.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O ye Corinthians, our mouth is open unto you, our heart is enlarged.

paragraphs.content: Ye are not straitened in us, but ye are straitened in your own bowels.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ye are not straitened in us, but ye are straitened in your own bowels.

paragraphs.content: Now for a recompence in the same, (I speak as unto my children,) be ye also enlarged.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now for a recompence in the same, (I speak as unto my children,) be ye also enlarged.

paragraphs.content: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers: for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness? and what communion hath light with darkness?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers: for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness? and what communion hath light with darkness?

paragraphs.content: And what concord hath Christ with Belial? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel?
paragraphs.contentHtml: And what concord hath Christ with Belial? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel?

paragraphs.content: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols? for ye are the temple of the living God; as God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols? for ye are the temple of the living God; as God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.

paragraphs.content: Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you,

paragraphs.content: And will be a Father unto you, and ye shall be my sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And will be a Father unto you, and ye shall be my sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty.
